sentences.english: Each oil tung flower has one day-long of life.
sentences.chinese: 每朵油桐花都只有一天的寿命。

sentences.english: Stick a vase on the table for those flowers I got.
sentences.chinese: 在桌上放个花瓶，把我摘的花都放进去吧。

sentences.english: Finally, Huadu will be famous for passion fruit, therefore forming a brand effect.
sentences.chinese: 把百香果打造成花都的“名片”之一，形成品牌效应。

sentences.english: A: And all of the flowers are in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 还有所有的花都盛开着。

sentences.english: Many flowers open in the morning and close at night.
sentences.chinese: 很多花都是早晨张开夜晚合上。

sentences.english: This man-eating monster was found in Guangzhou. I think it's good for portrait.
sentences.chinese: 广州花都吃人湖怪，卖相倒是蛮好的，很适合拍肖像。

sentences.english: The flowers drooped down to the ground, because of the heat.
sentences.chinese: 由于太热，那些花都软弱无力地躺在地上。

sentences.english: A kid, I am apart from fairy mountains, what flowers did not know.
sentences.chinese: 小时侯，我除了仙人山，什么花都不认识。

sentences.english: The airport is located in Guangzhou's Huadu district, 28 kilometres north of downtown.
sentences.chinese: 机场位于广州市花都区，距市中心28公里。

sentences.english: These kids were attracted by me and my camera in Huadu.
sentences.chinese: 在花都，一群小朋友被我和我的相机吸引着。

sentences.english: The factory is situated in Huadu District of Guangzhou Shiling Town.
sentences.chinese: 工厂地处广州市花都区狮岭镇。

sentences.english: The monkey had deflowered an entire section of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这只猴子把花园中一整块地方的花都糟蹋了。

sentences.english: Most flowers will not D. thrive without sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 没有阳光许多花都不能茁壮成长。

sentences.english: The sunny very hot, The flower opened, the summer looks like a sporter .
sentences.chinese: 阳光十分炎热，花都开了，夏天像一个运动员。

sentences.english: I for China and Hong Kong joint venture company, located in Huadu District, Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 我公司为中港合资公司，座落在广州市花都区。
